net.kuujo.vertigo.io

Interface InputContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context<InputContext>, IOContext<InputContext>, net.kuujo.vertigo.util.serialization.JsonSerializable, net.kuujo.vertigo.util.Observable<InputContext>

    public interface InputContext
extends IOContext<InputContext>
    Input context is a wrapper around input port information for a single component instance.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
